divs: sighting details i was sitting watching t.v when i looked out the window and i saw a oval shaped object grey and silver.it would bobble and roll as it flew,i thought it was a party balloon floating in the sky from the park down the street ,but realized it wasn't.i grabbed my video camera and i filmed the craft flying over behind my apt in my apt complex-it was 3:30pm oct 20th-2009-i was w\my friend josh.f-who eye witnessed this w\me.-the craft was flying slow,(light pole level).it would speed up then slow down-stand in place for a few seconds then keep flying.the craft flew over the gallup sports complex center where there was 3 little league baseball games going on at the time.the stadium was full of other people.the day was totally clear and sunny-the craft flew over route 602 then sped away at about 150 mph-going south \south east heading toward the gallup indian hospital(i.h.s).we made a video disk and gave the disk to ufo researcher *(name deleted--cms\sg)...(2weeks later) the craft came back during a lightning storm,flying roof top level,going back over our apt complex this time (heading west) toward i-40-going towards sander az,,the craft was perfectly round and grey-it flew between the light poles very low,,between (arnold circle and arnold by aztec st).it flew over the allsup's convenient store and kept going....i've been trying to get a copy of the disk from *(name deleted--cms\sg) since,,but haven't been able to.i did talk to him once and he said he would look for the disk i gave him.when he gives me a copy back..i will post it..i keep an eye and a camera ready at all times.just in case it comes back.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Gallup
There were no other sightings in Gallup on or around October 20th 2009
Summary: small grey and silver-it rolled and bobbled (-perfectly round object)
Object Flight Path: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
